Access to CLMS data is possible via OData API:

::: {.panel-tabset}

# OData
[`https://catalogue.dataspace.copernicus.eu/odata/v1/Products?$filter=Collection/Name%20eq%20%27CLMS%27`](https://catalogue.dataspace.copernicus.eu/odata/v1/Products?$filter=Collection/Name%20eq%20%27CLMS%27){target="_blank"}

:::

Access is possible through the S3 protocol. The S3 Path is:

```
/EODATA/CLMS/

```

In order to get access to data at specific processing level as well as specific product types, you are advised to use queries provided in each section below.

If it is required to customize query in respect to spatial and time coverage, satellite features etc. please, follow instructions on:
